title: nArAyaNa tE
sahitya:
nArAyaNa tE namO namO bhava nArada sannuta namO namO


caraNam 1    murahara nagadhara mukunda mAdhava garuDa gamana pankajanAbha 
parama puruSa bhavabhanjana kEshava nara mrga namO namO
    caraNam 2    jaladhi shayana ravicandra vilOcana jalaruha bhavasuta caraNayuga 
bali bandhana gOvardhanOddhAra naLinOdara tE namO namO
    caraNam 3    Adi daiva sakalAgama pUjita yAdava kula mOhana rUpa 
vEdOddhAra shrI vEnkaTanAyaka purandara viTTala namO namO
